title: Jerry Jones, New Orleans Saints, and Jared Goff
itunes:title: Jerry Jones, New Orleans Saints, and Jared Goff
description:
Colin comments on Jerry Jones’s interview on Ezekiel Elliott’s hold out, New Orleans still not getting over the NFC Championship game, Jared Goff’s place on the NFL Network’s top 100 list, and parity in the NFL. Guests include Michael Vick, Greg Jennings, Mark Schlereth and Tom Pelissero. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
